Text: We are the void.
We know more than any being which ever existed.
We have been waiting for you.
It is time to begin.
Press #action{Action1} for main guns
Press #action{Action2} for secondary weapon\nZoom in/out with #hcolor{}Mouse Wheel#dcolor{}
Press #action{Up}, #action{Left}, #action{Down} and #action{Right} to move\nFollow the arrow #image{255,255,0,missionTarget}
Destroy The Enemy
Destroy the enemy!
One down  a million more to go.
Destroy the Command Station
Destroying the Command Station will disable all enemies in the sector.
One down, billions more to go.
Destroying the #color{255,0,0}Command Station#dcolor{} will disable all enemies in this sector.
Good job\nUse #action{Action4} for a speed boost
This is Captain Kemron from the Federation starship Vortex.\nYou are trespassing in a private Federation sector.\nIdentify yourself!
Prepare for extermination! #color{255,0,0}[Attack]#dcolor{}
My navigation program is experiencing problems.
I am a servant of the Void.\nStand aside or face annihilation.
All hands - battle stations!
I do not care. Turn around and leave this sector immediately!

All hands - battle stations!
Servant of the Void you are surrounded and outnumbered.
Lower your shields and prepare to be boarded.
This is your last warning.
Defend the station, destroy the intruder!
Objective completed. You destroyed the command station.
It's time for the next phase.
Get closer to the sun.
Open your inventory (#action{Inventory}), equip #itemname{StarDestroyerItem}#itemicon{StarDestroyerItem}
Star Destroyer charge complete. Annihilate Sun.
Aim at the sun and press #action{Action2} to fire!
You destroyed the sun. The resulting Supernova ripped the fabric of spacetime.\nYou were thrown to the edge of the galaxy. Your adventure begins!
Press #action{Left}, #action{Right} and #action{Down}
